title: Anyone wanna play?
body: Don't look at my match history. Alright? I was in tilt.

replies.body: i wouldn't mind playing l main mid and bronze 4 because i want to get to bronze five but now i want to climbed back up to where i was before sliver 3 and add me if you want
Will do ;) ill play with you over the weekend.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
